<noinclude>
This is the Electrochemical conversion of CO2 overview experiments template.
</noinclude>
<includeonly><tr>

|{{{limiting_turnover_number__CO|0}}}
|{{{limiting_turnover_number__HCOOH|0}}}
|{{{limiting_turnover_number__H2C2O4|0}}}

|{{{limiting_turnover_number__C2H4|0}}}
|{{{limiting_turnover_number__CH3CH2OH|0}}}
}}</td>


<td>{{#subobject:

 |Limiting turnover number at={{{limiting_turnover_number__H2C2O4|}}}; H2C2O4
 |Limiting turnover number at={{{limiting_turnover_number__H2CO|}}}; H2CO
